bug.short_desc: Cannot install and configure Cherokee on Fedora 23 because of a missing interpreter

long_desc.thetext:
$ sudo dnf install cherokee [blah blah] Installed : cherokee.x86_64 1.2.103-7.fc23 mariadb-common.x86_64 1:10.0.20-3.fc23 mariadb-config.x86_64 1:10.0.20-3.fc23 mariadb-libs.x86_64 1:10.0.20-3.fc23 spawn-fcgi.x86_64 1.6.3-9.fc23
$ sudo cherokee-admin [16/11/2015 11:47:56.308] (error) source_interpreter.c:479 - Could not find interpreter '/usr/share/cherokee/admin/server.py 4000 /etc/cherokee/cherokee.conf' | The server configuration refers to an interpreter that is not installed in this system. main_admin.c:425 - Could not initialize the server

I am having the same issue, when you look in the /usr/share/Cherokee/admin folder there are a whole load of .py files missing including the server.py file.
I have tried copying them but it still doesn't work.
I have prepared new version 1.2.104-1, I will try to give it to public testing tomorrow (I hope)

(In reply to Pavel Lisý from comment #2) > I have prepared new version 1.2.104-1, I will try to give it to public > testing tomorrow (I hope)
Thanks

(In reply to Pavel Lisý from comment #4) > Try this: > > http://ftp-hk.tmapy.cz/tmapy-twist/fedora/23/os/x86_64/RPMS/
That worked bud, many thanks.

@Pavel, thanks, that fixed it for me.
You are the maintainer, right? Why not offer a Fedora update. I would expect an upstream release bump like 1.2.103 -> 1.2.104 to be an acceptable update for Fedora.
Hi. Any idea why this isn't in @updates yet?

Same here. "sudo dnf update cherokee --releasever=24" installed a newer version (1.2.103-8.fc24), but I'm still having the same problem.
Haven't tried the tmapy.cz one.
cherokee-1.2.104-1.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-1fd3c00778
cherokee-1.2.104-1.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-d0df752d7a
cherokee-1.2.104-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-83bab6a1cf

cherokee-1.2.104-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-d0df752d7a
